articles.title: Tencent, Sony Throw Big Money At Elden Ring Maker FromSoftware - Kotaku
articles.description: The deal grants the Dark Souls and Bloodborne developer a boatload of cash to pursue future endeavors
articles.content: Elden Ring wasnt just a hit with fans of FromSoftwares notoriously difficult action-RPGs. Today Tencent Holdings and Sony announced theyve acquired 30% of the Souls-series developers shares, split in… [+2206 chars]
